title: Nordic CIO

title: PhD Student

links.label: Enriching software process improvement with knowledge management (Thesis)

title: CTO and co-founder
description: Co-founded Blackwood Seven - a technology platform which will change the way advertisers control they media spending and allocation. I organised the technology setup and lead the development team from 1 to 10 employees. Worked a lot with the development process and implemented a lean and democratic process to conduct continous integration and testing in a highly agile environmet. Particpated a lot in the product management as well.
